original_text: And the sons of Eliezer were, Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had none other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.
korean_text: 엘리에셀의 아들들은 우두머리 르하뱌라 엘리에셀에게 이 외에는 다른 아들이 없고 르하뱌의 아들들은 심히 많았으며

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Eliezer were, Rehabiah chief.
And Eliezer had none other sons;
but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.
